publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6873 Margaret Mitchell: Congratulations to Pamela Pretswellâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Pamela Prestwell, 21, from Hamilton, on winning the Ladies British Open Amateur Stroke Play Championship at Tenby Golf Club in Wales on 20 August 2010; notes that she is the fourth Scottish golfer to win the tournament in the past seven years, and wishes Pamela the very best of success in her career for the future.

S3M-6873 Congratulations to Pamela Pretswell (lodged on 26 August 2010) Christina McKelvie*, John Lamont*, Elaine Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Aitken*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Jack McConnell*, Mary Scanlon*, David McLetchie*
S3M-6873 Congratulations to Pamela Pretswell (lodged on 26 August 2010) Gil Paterson*
S3M-6873 Congratulations to Pamela Pretswell (lodged on 26 August 2010) Tom McCabe*
